title: Verify: Implement WebSocket Protocol with Auth and Recovery
description:
Run automated tests for task T-070.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement structured WebSocket message format, reconnection with state recovery, and authentication on WebSocket connections.
Criteria:
- WebSocket messages follow specified format
- Client can reconnect and recover state
- WebSocket connections require authentication
acceptance_criteria: Client can reconnect and recover state
